items.title: “Make The Planet A Line Item”: How 1% For The Planet Is Rewiring Corporate Giving
items.description: 1% for the Planet certifies companies donating 1% of revenue to vetted environmental nonprofits—embedding climate giving as a core business commitment...

items.title: 6 Things To Know About Slowing Aging, According To Dr. David Sinclair
items.description: Insights from the Andrew Huberman–David Sinclair podcast on how epigenetics, mitochondria, exercise and lifestyle factors may influence healthy aging.

items.title: Walmart Shares Drop As CEO Doug McMillon Announces Retirement
items.description: McMillon will be replaced by John Furner, head of Walmart’s U.S. operations, in January.

items.title: You Can Play The ‘Horizon Steel Frontiers’ MMO On Steam Machine, Not PS5
items.description: Horizon Steel Frontiers will be on PC but not PS5, a bizarre representation of the multi-platform era of video games now.
